attributes.additional_details: To petition the Department for International Development to conduct a full investigation into the use of aid funds in Ethiopia, specifically considering allegations that money given by western donors including the United Kingdom, is being used to suppress and abuse the human rights of supporters of opposition groups in the country such as the Ogaden National Liberation Front. This should include a full investigation by the DfID and the proposition of a resolution to the United Nations General Assembly to fully investigate human rights abuses by the Ethiopian government.
